A bit more context:
With less than 3 conferences chosen you get a button to add one more:

With 3 conferences, the button disappears:

And it only happens with the :attendances, not with other nested attributes (like number of members in a team.)
body_text:
A bit more context:
With less than 3 conferences chosen you get a button to add one more:

With 3 conferences, the button disappears:

And it only happens with the :attendances, not with other nested attributes (like  number of members in a team.)
body:
A bit more context:
With less than 3 conferences chosen you get a button to add one more:
![with 2 conferences](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6314687/20724719/9d023bb2-b66f-11e6-807b-c9e36d5370cf.png)

With 3 conferences, the button disappears:
![with 3 conferences](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/6314687/20724710/943f7742-b66f-11e6-8ad4-08778702ad53.png)

And it only happens with the `:attendances`, not with other nested attributes (like  number of members in a team.)
